features.name: Fluorescence Map (War Room)
features.description: Main interface for monitoring fleet operations with MapLibre base layer, SVG overlays, view modes (project/client/factory), filters, and responsive layout.

features.name: Map Canvas
features.description: MapLibre GL map container with zoom controls, fullscreen, and canvas resize handling.

features.name: Map Markers
features.description: SVG marker placement for nodes (clients, factories, projects) with coordinate projection.

features.name: View Toggle and Filters
features.description: Project/Client/Factory view mode selection, filter panel (companies, status, regions), and active filters bar.

features.name: Sidebar Panel
features.description: Right-side overlay panel with Activity Log, Hub Status tabs, and Clients panel. Responsive bottom-sheet on mobile.

features.name: Map Controls
features.description: Zoom in/out, fullscreen, and map action buttons (Panels, Expand Map, Tactical mode).

features.name: Authentication
features.description: Sign-in flow. App redirects to /custom/sign-in for unauthenticated users.

features.name: Layout
features.description: Full layout with header, sidemenu, main content. Route-scoped body class for fluorescence-map responsive overrides.
